name: Gene-freak Fury
description:
Hi! 

This is my entry for the 7 day rouge like challenge!
It is a FPS-Rouge-Like inspired by Duke Nukem 3D and Doom. My initial plan was to have some kind of narrative build into the game, but due to time constraints I wasn't able to add it.
So here is the "background-story":
You play as a mercenary and got hired to "clean" a research station. In this station, gene experiments were carried out on various creatures. Obviously something went wrong and you are now supposed to get rid of any evidence.

As mentioned above time was a limiting factor for me. I started on Monday the 6th and ended on Sunday the 12th. I did submit like 2 minutes before midnight. Sadly my Web-build wasn't working by then. So I uploaded a working version 10 minutes after midnight, which means technically this wasn't in the deadline. It's completely the same though.

If you run into any performance issues I advise you to reduce the view distance and try the desktop build. 
HAVE FUN :)

Controls:
W/A/S/D - Move
Mouse 1 - Shoot
Mouse Wheel - Switch Weapon
ESC - Pause
